infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to your microphone to record clinical notes during patient encounters.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: This app needs speech recognition to transcribe your voice notes into text.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to take clinical photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to select clinical photos.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This app uses Face ID for secure biometric authentication.

plugins.microphonePermission: Allow Dermatology EHR to access your microphone for recording clinical notes.

plugins.faceIDPermission: Allow Dermatology EHR to use Face ID for secure authentication.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Dermatology EHR to access your camera for clinical photos.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Dermatology EHR to access your photo library for clinical photos.
